text.headline:
Welcome to
Yosuke's career Timeline
text.text: This timeline shows how I have been going through from university. (Sorry I am still young lol)

text.headline: Starting my bachelor in Tokyo Metropolitan University
text.text: After severe studying for an entering exam, I passed my first choise of University.

text.headline: Studying abroad in Canada
text.text: I was typical Japanese who never been to abroad and don't speak English AT ALL.Since I felt learning English is necessary from now on, I decided to study in Canada for a year which is my turing point of my life.

media.caption:
My Master thesis(Sorry only in Japanese!)
(A quantitative study for capturing the townâ€™s atmosphere by utilizing Convolutional Neural Network : A case study for Shimokitazawa )

text.headline: Starting my master in Tokyo Metropolitan University
text.text: Since I wanted to study more of analytics, I decided to start my master and study harder.

text.headline: Machine learning engineer intern at Key to Metal
text.text: Since study abroad in Europe got cancelled due to COVID-19 two times, I decided to do an intern in Belgrade, Serbia during summer vacation. After all, they offered me an intern position on remote due to my higher performance.

text.headline: Data Scientist at Nomura Research Institute
text.text: After job huntinig, I started to work in Japanese IT consulting company as a data scientist.
